title: $2,000 / 2br - 2 BEDROOM & 1 BATHROOM APT AVAILABLE FOR RENT -
posting_body: ['2 BEDROOM & 1 BATHROOM', '$2000 WITH HEAT & HOT WATER INCLUDED.', 'MOVE IN READY.', 'PROPERTY DETAILS:', '----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------', 'NOW AVAILABLE BIG LIVING ROOM AND KITCHEN, 2 BEDROOM AND 1 BATHROOM APARTMENT ON THE 2ND FLOOR OF A PRIVATE 2 FAMILY HOME.', 'LOCATION:', '----------------------------------------------------------------------‐---------------', 'THIS PROPERTY IS LOCATED ON 114THST AND 109TH AVENUE SOUTH OZONE PARK, 2 BLOCKS AWAY FROM SUBWAY AND BUS.', '2 BLOCKS AWAY FROM ALL MAJOR TRANSPORTATIONS, SHOPPING CENTERS AND RESTAURANTS.', 'QUIET AND SAFE NEIGHBORHOOD.', '****NO SMOKING - NON-SMOKERS & NO PETS****', 'DRIVEWAY AND BACKYARD IS OFF LIMITS.', 'NO SUBLETTING, NO ROOM FOR RENT.', 'NO VOUCHERS/NO SEC8.', 'MOVE-IN-READY.', 'EASY SHOWING & EASY APPROVAL PROCESS!!', '****REQUIREMENTS:*****', '1).', '2 RECENT PAYSTUBS', '2).', 'BANK STATEMENTS (showing direct deposits)', '3).', 'W2s', '4).', 'RECENT CREDIT REPORT W/ CREDIT SCORE', '5.)', 'INCOME VERIFICATION LETTER', '1st MONTHS RENT.', '$2000.', 'SECURITY DEPOSIT.', '$2000.', 'NO FEES (THIS LISTING IS BY LANDLORD)', 'CONTACT OR EMAIL, PLEASE HAVE ALL REQUIRED DOCUMENTS LISTED ABOVE', 'TO SAVE US TIME PLEASE FILL OUT', 'THIS PRE-SCREENING FORM BEFORE CALLING  TO SCHEDULE ANY VIEWING:', 'https://forms.gle/XNdHU31PiYhaTejx7', 'CALL 347-454-2044 BETWEEN 11AM - 8PM ONLY']
